item.title: Bitcoin Dip Fuels Institutional Appetite: Can Today’s Huge Buys Push the Price to $100K in December?
item.description:
Despite a recent Bitcoin price dip, institutional investors are doubling down. MicroStrategy acquired another $1.5 billion in BTC, while MARA Holdings seeks to raise $805 million for further Bitcoin purchases. Even Genius Group joined the buying spree, bolstering its "Bitcoin-first" strategy. Metaplanet's Bitcoin reward program further highlights growing interest in the cryptocurrency. Can this influx of capital propel the Bitcoin price to $100k before year's end?

The post Bitcoin Dip Fuels Institutional Appetite: Can Today’s Huge Buys Push the Price to $100K in December? appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: South Korean Crypto-related Stocks Rise on News of Tax Delay
item.description:
Crypto-related stocks rose again in South Korea after lawmakers agreed to delay the launch of crypto tax in the nation by a further two years.

The post South Korean Crypto-related Stocks Rise on News of Tax Delay appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Parody Of Enron Relaunch Makes Waves On Social Media
item.description:
Kenneth Lay’s failed energy corporation Enron announced its plans to relaunch while hinting at decentralized technology during an apparent parody stunt that shook up social media on Monday. The energy giant filed for bankruptcy 23 years to the day of the parodic announcement.

The post Parody Of Enron Relaunch Makes Waves On Social Media appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Nike-Owned RTFKT Announces to Cease Web3 Operations
item.description:
Nike-owned RTFKT will close by January 2025 with its final release, the MNLTH X featuring the BLADE DROP, set for December and a website to honor its projects.

The post Nike-Owned RTFKT Announces to Cease Web3 Operations appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Jump Trading Firm Wallet Buys $500,000 of New Cat Meme Coin Catslap, CEX Listing News in 2 Days
item.description:
The dynamic new cat meme coin Catslap ($SLAP) is attracting Chicago proprietary trading house whales. One firm bought nearly $500,000 of $SLAP, pushing the token price up to $0.0042 today. item.title: Genius Group Boosts Bitcoin Holdings to 172 BTC with $1.8M Purchase
item.description:
Genius Group has increased its Bitcoin holdings to 172 BTC, worth $15.8 million, following a $1.8 million purchase as part of its "Bitcoin-first" strategy, which aims to allocate 90% of reserves to Bitcoin.

The post Genius Group Boosts Bitcoin Holdings to 172 BTC with $1.8M Purchase appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: ECB Releases Second Progress Report on Digital Euro Project
item.description:
The European Central Bank (ECB) has published its second progress report on the digital euro project, highlighting updates to the digital euro rulebook and ongoing efforts to create a unified digital payment system for the euro area.

The post ECB Releases Second Progress Report on Digital Euro Project appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: DOGE Head Vivek Ramaswamy Says ‘Drastic’ Reduction Coming To Federal Regulations
item.description:
Former U.S. presidential candidate and upcoming head of the newly-created Department of Governmental Efficiency (DOGE) Vivek Ramaswamy says that the federal government’s regulatory overhead will experience a “drastic” reduction, the President-elect Donald Trump associate revealed in a December 1 X post. Ramaswamy is set to slash federal regulations through DOGE alongside X CEO Elon Musk come January.

The post DOGE Head Vivek Ramaswamy Says ‘Drastic’ Reduction Coming To Federal Regulations appeared first on Cryptonews.
